SELECT m.member_name, m.member_email, tm.ROLE, p.title, p.start_date, p.end_date, m.member_key FROM MEMBER m LEFT JOIN TEAM_MEMBER tm ON tm.MEMBER_KEY = m.MEMBER_KEY LEFT JOIN TEAM t ON t.team_key = tm.TEAM_KEY LEFT JOIN PROJECT p ON p.project_key = t.PROJECT_KEY WHERE m.MEMBER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{member_name} || '%' ORDER BY m.MEMBER_KEY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROJECT (project_key, title, detail, status, start_date, end_date) VALUES ('PJ-' || project_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{detail}, '진행중', TO_DATE(#{start_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{end_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))

INSERT INTO TASK (task_key, project_key, text, start_date, end_date, progress, parent, task_type, status, task_rollup, task_open, detail) VALUES (task_seq.nextval, 'PJ-'||project_seq.currval, #{title}, TO_DATE(#{start_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{end_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 0, 0, 'project', '진행중', 0, 1, #{detail})
INSERT INTO TEAM (team_key, team_name, project_key, project_cnt) VALUES (team_seq.nextval, #{team_name}, 'PJ-' || project_seq.CURRVAL,0)
mapper.update: UPDATE TEAM SET PROJECT_CNT = ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TEAM_MEMBER tm WHERE tm.team_key = TEAM.team_key)
